column6: Reed and Sue team up with the New FF in a desperate gambit to find the source of the disease wracking the fabric of spacetime itself. Only one being can follow such an ineffable trail but a resentful Silver Surfer is in no mood to help King T'Challa. Plus Dr. Strange, The Watcher, and the awesome destiny of Gravity!
column8: | inker:Rick Magyar | writer:Dwayne McDuffie | colorist:Paul Mounts | penciller:Paul Pelletier | penciller (cover):Michael Turner | letterer:Rus Wooton
